sn29.4:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā … pe …
sn29.4:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.4:4.4: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacce jalābujā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti?
sn29.4:4.6: “Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacce jalābujā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti.
